gun_fire_ssr_star.RemouldDetail: <shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. This effect does not stack.

gun_fire_ssr_star_4.RemouldDetail: Heavy Bombardment, Dodge Attack, and Close Quarters inflict <ComLblGreen>Ion Scorch</> on targets that are already burned, dealing flame damage equal to <shuzhi>60%</> of their current ATK every second for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

gun_fire_ssr_star_6.RemouldDetail: The damage from <ComLblGreen>Ion Scorch</> increases to <shuzhi>90%</> of ATK. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skills will refresh the duration of <ComLblGreen>Ion Scorch</>.

gun_fire_ssr_star_7.RemouldDetail: <ComLblGreen>Barrage</> inflicts burn for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skills reduce the cooldown of <ComLblGreen>Barrage</> by <shuzhi>4</> seconds. This effect has a <shuzhi>1.5</>-second cooldown.

ShieldAxe_Fire_ssr_star_2.RemouldDetail: Gain a stack of Strong Shield upon casting Discharge: Seething Rage. Switching to axe form converts all Strong Shield stacks to Sharp Axe stacks, each of which increases damage by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Switching to a different weapon cancels this effect.

ShieldAxe_Fire_ssr_star_6.RemouldDetail: After switching to a shield axe, immediately grant <shuzhi>30%</> damage reduction that diminishes by <shuzhi>10%</> every <shuzhi>3</> seconds, down to a minimum of <shuzhi>10%</>. Switching weapons cancels this effect. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

ShieldAxe_Fire_ssr_star_7.RemouldDetail:
Enhance conversion skills.
Shield Conversion Enhancement: Increases damage dealt by <shuzhi>60%</> and expands the radius of the flame zone by <shuzhi>30%</>.
Axe Conversion Enhancement: Does not share cooldown with Shield Conversion. For the next <shuzhi>5</> seconds after using this skill, turns all damage received into HP (up to a maximum of <shuzhi>15%</> of the user's Max HP).

Mark_physic_ssr_star.RemouldDetail:
<shuzhi>Guard when playing on a team</>: Unleashing Heavy System Strike, Form Switch, or Maximum Firepower, receive <shuzhi>40%</> of all damage dealt to the allied Wanderer with the lowest HP for <shuzhi>10</> seconds in their stead. After the effect ends, recover <shuzhi>10%</> of lost HP. Trigger only when you have <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance</>. Cannot remove or trigger the effect again until its duration ends.
<shuzhi>Amplification when playing solo</>: Gain <shuzhi>50%</> physical damage reduction in Heavy System Form
<shuzhi>Heavy System Shield</>: Gain <shuzhi>1</> Heavy System Energy Point when Heavy System Attack, Flailing Cleave, or Crashing Slash hits the target. Upon reaching <shuzhi>20</> points, turn <shuzhi>20%</> of your current HP into <shuzhi>1.5</> times of the Heavy System Shield (no more than 1.5 times the maximum HP, during which healing is reduced by 50%). The shield lasts <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Cannot obtain Heavy System Shield when HP is below <shuzhi>10%</>. <shuzhi>66.7%</> of the remaining shield value is converted to HP when the shield ends. Gain <shuzhi>2</> Heavy System Energy Points upon hitting a vulnerable target. While Heavy System Shield is activated, other HP shields can be converted into Heavy System Shield and are immune to the addition of HP shields.

Mark_physic_ssr_star_2.RemouldDetail: Gain Heavy System Shield immediately when you release Heavy System Strike, Form Switch, or Maximum Firepower.

Mark_physic_ssr_star_3.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's HP growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Mark_physic_ssr_star_4.RemouldDetail: Gain 1 stack of <shuzhi>35%</> final damage boost when the Heavy System Shield ends, breaks or refreshes, for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Not stackable.

Mark_physic_ssr_star_5.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's HP growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Mark_physic_ssr_star_6.RemouldDetail: When Heavy System Shield ends, breaks, or refreshes, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>160%</> of current ATK + <shuzhi>5%</> of lost HP to nearby targets. Gain <shuzhi>50</> points of weapon charges by hitting targets.

Mark_physic_ssr_star_7.RemouldDetail: During Heavy System Shield, physical resistance <shuzhi>doubles</> with a hyperbody effect. Additionally, gain another Heavy System Shield when the skill of other weapons hits the target or when using a discharge skill during Heavy System Shield.

Immortal_thunder_ssr_star.RemouldDetail:
Activate Fighting Spirit upon entering battle, increasing final damage by <shuzhi>15%</> while accelerating Cellular Decay (lose <shuzhi>1%</> of current HP every <shuzhi>5</> seconds). The effect, "switching weapons cancels the effect," ends upon leaving battle.
Cellular Decay is halted when HP drops below <shuzhi>50%</>, but effects of Fighting Spirit are retained. Switching weapons cancels the effect.

Immortal_thunder_ssr_star_2.RemouldDetail:
<shuzhi>Blade Slash</> deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>80%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>2.5%</> of missing HP.
<shuzhi>Cupping Dragon</>'s explosion deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>160%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>5%</> of missing HP.
<shuzhi>Force Field</> deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>160%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>5%</> of missing HP. Damage over time does not trigger this effect."

Immortal_thunder_ssr_star_3.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Immortal_thunder_ssr_star_4.RemouldDetail: Increase shatter by <shuzhi>15%</>. Upon shattering the target's shield, place a Cupping Bomb at the target's location, instantly dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>680%</> of ATK to all nearby targets. If there is only one enemy in the target area, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>1,500%</> of ATK.

Immortal_thunder_ssr_star_5.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Immortal_thunder_ssr_star_6.RemouldDetail: Automatically block for <shuzhi>1</> second upon being attacked. Dispel any control effects immediately when activated. Negate the next incoming attack that deals less than <shuzhi>20%</> of the max HP. While blocking, tapping the normal attack button unleashes a <shuzhi>Counter Slash</> on the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>240%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>suspending them</>. <shuzhi>18</>-second cooldown.

Immortal_thunder_ssr_star_7.RemouldDetail: Upon entering the effective range of <shuzhi>Force Field</> or <shuzhi>Phantasia</>, boost the effects of Fighting Spirit for <shuzhi>7</> seconds, increasing final damage by <shuzhi>40%</> and halting Cellular Decay. Switching weapons cancels the effect.

Suspension_thunder_ssr_star.RemouldDetail: <shuzhi>Volt Resonance</>: Increase volt ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and volt resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more volt weapons. This set's effects do not work with others.

Suspension_thunder_ssr_star_2.RemouldDetail: After using <shuzhi>Pulse Lock</> or <shuzhi>Particle Beam Burst</>, creates <shuzhi>1</> Electrode that immediately grants the user <shuzhi>5</> stacks of healing chain enhance. In addition, unleash a healing chain that heals nearby allies by <shuzhi>135%</> of the Wanderer's ATK.

Suspension_thunder_ssr_star_3.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Suspension_thunder_ssr_star_4.RemouldDetail: Every <shuzhi>6</> seconds, the Electrode will unleash <shuzhi>Ring Lightning</>, which deals damage equal to a maximum of <shuzhi>205%</> of ATK in a target area.

Suspension_thunder_ssr_star_5.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Suspension_thunder_ssr_star_6.RemouldDetail: After using <shuzhi>Pulse Lock</>, increase the Wanderer's ATK by (<shuzhi>5</> + (Number of Electrodes <shuzhi>5</>))% for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Suspension_thunder_ssr_star_7.RemouldDetail: Up to <shuzhi>2</> Electrodes can be active at the same time. Summoning more Electrodes will replace the ones furthest from the user.

Frigg_ice_ssr_star.RemouldDetail: <shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>25%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set's effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. This effect does not stack.

Frigg_ice_ssr_star_2.RemouldDetail:
Gain <shuzhi>1</> frostiness point every time you receive <shuzhi>550%</>  Frost ATK of damage in the Frost Domain. Up to <shuzhi>10</> frost points can be accumulated.
When Frost Domain ends, frostiness points  Frost ATK  <shuzhi>95%</> of blast damage will be dealt to all enemies in the Frost Domain. After leaving the Frost Domain lose <shuzhi>1</> frostiness point every <shuzhi>3</> seconds.

Frigg_ice_ssr_star_3.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

Frigg_ice_ssr_star_4.RemouldDetail: Increase frostiness limit to <shuzhi>15</>. When using discharge skills of frost weapons in the frost domain, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of frost ATK  (current frostiness +5) to all the targets in the frost domain.

Frigg_ice_ssr_star_5.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

Frigg_ice_ssr_star_6.RemouldDetail: Shattering shields using frost weapons in the Frost Domain will freeze the target for <shuzhi>2</> seconds and cause frostiness points  Frost ATK  <shuzhi>35%</> of additional damage (if the target cannot be frozen, double the additional damage dealt).

Frigg_ice_ssr_star_7.RemouldDetail: When frostiness reaches <shuzhi>15</> points and you are in the Frost Domain, you will get an additional "Domain of Frost II" that increases Frost ATK by <shuzhi>12%</> when frost weapons are used.

funnel_fire_ssr_star.RemouldDetail: <shuzhi>Flame Resonance</>: Increase flame ATK by <shuzhi>20%</> and flame resistance by <shuzhi>40%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more flame weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot.

funnel_fire_ssr_star_2.RemouldDetail: Emblazen boosts the damage of Spark's normal attacks to <shuzhi>182%</>. Skill cooldown drops to <shuzhi>24</> seconds.

funnel_fire_ssr_star_3.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

funnel_fire_ssr_star_4.RemouldDetail: Emblazen increases flame boost by <shuzhi>18%</>, increasing burn multiplier by <shuzhi>150%</>.

funnel_fire_ssr_star_5.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

funnel_fire_ssr_star_6.RemouldDetail: Each time Spark Attack hit an enemy, restore an additional <shuzhi>75</> points of the weapon charge. Cooldown: 0.9 second. When Ultimate Heat is active, shatter increases by <shuzhi>25%</>.

funnel_fire_ssr_star_7.RemouldDetail: Emblazen boosts the damage of Spark's normal attacks to <shuzhi>240%</>. Heat acquisition efficiency doubles. Skill cooldown drops to <shuzhi>16</> seconds.

dkatana_ice_ssr_star.RemouldDetail: <shuzhi>Frost Resonance</>: Increase frost ATK by <shuzhi>20%</> and frost resistance by <shuzhi>40%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> or more frost weapons. This set's effects work with others.

dkatana_ice_ssr_star_2.RemouldDetail: Release any weapon skills <shuzhi>5</> times while the Frost Resonance is activated to reset all weapons' cooldown and increase damage by <shuzhi>100%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds on Flow and Counterattack.

dkatana_ice_ssr_star_3.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>16%</>.

dkatana_ice_ssr_star_4.RemouldDetail:
In the state of Agitaraxy: Increase the sword shadow Surge damage to <shuzhi>900%</> of frost ATK.
In the state of Ataraxy: Cooldown of sword shadow Surge is now <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

dkatana_ice_ssr_star_5.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by <shuzhi>32%</>.

dkatana_ice_ssr_star_6.RemouldDetail: Freeze time and trigger Phantasia upon Surge hitting the target. Share cooldown with the Phantasia triggered by dodging.

dkatana_ice_ssr_star_7.RemouldDetail:
Increase frost damage dealt by <shuzhi>20%</> upon Surge hitting the target, lasting for <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
Reduce frost damage received from nearby enemies by <shuzhi>25%</> upon blocking attacks with the sword shadow, lasting for <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

Gun_thunder_sr_star_2.RemouldDetail: Enemies caught in the Tempest Round's area of effect are slowed by 30% for 1 second.

Gun_thunder_sr_star_3.RemouldDetail: Increase activation range and blast radius of landmines.

Gun_thunder_sr_star_4.RemouldDetail: Restore 1 dodge attempt after hitting any enemy with a landmine.

Gun_thunder_sr_star_5.RemouldDetail: Increase Tempest Round's area of effect and duration.

Gun_thunder_sr_star_6.RemouldDetail: Placing a landmine within Tempest Round's area of effect immediately detonates it, generating another Tempest Round and expanding its area of effect.

bigsword_physic_sr_star_2.RemouldDetail: Switching to this weapon grants a shield equal to <shuzhi>7.5%</> of Max HP that lasts up to <shuzhi>10</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.

bigsword_physic_sr_star_3.RemouldDetail: When equipped with 2 or more defense-type weapons, reduce damage received by <shuzhi>3%</>. Take effect immediately and stack with multiple weapons. Effect and aggro are both increased when playing in a team.

bigsword_physic_sr_star_4.RemouldDetail: Upon switching to the weapon, gain a shield equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>10</> seconds and immunity to hitstun. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.

bigsword_physic_sr_star_6.RemouldDetail: Targets hit by discharge skills take an additional <shuzhi>15%</> physical damage for the next <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

spear_physic_sr_star_2.RemouldDetail: While airborne, each successful attack increases the user's final damage dealt by <shuzhi>4%</>, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>20%</>.

spear_physic_sr_star_3.RemouldDetail: When equipped with 2 or more DPS-type weapons, deal an additional <shuzhi>7.5%</> final damage to targets with less than <shuzhi>50%</> HP. Take effect immediately and stack with multiple weapons. Effect is boosted when playing in a team.

spear_physic_sr_star_4.RemouldDetail: Hitting targets while airborne has a <shuzhi>30%</> chance to reduce all weapon skill cooldowns by <shuzhi>2</> seconds.

spear_physic_sr_star_5.RemouldDetail: After landing, the damage boost persists for the next <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

spear_physic_sr_star_6.RemouldDetail: Deal an additional <shuzhi>30%</> Final Damage to airborne/stunned/frozen/electrified targets.

sickle_physic_ssr_star_2.RemouldDetail: When equipped with 2 or more defense-type weapons, reduce damage received by an additional <shuzhi>5%</> whenever HP is less than <shuzhi>70%</>. Take effect immediately and stack with multiple weapons. Effect and aggro are both increased when playing in a team.

sickle_physic_ssr_star_3.RemouldDetail: When hyperbody is activated, increase its duration by <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds for every <shuzhi>5%</> HP lost.

sickle_physic_ssr_star_5.RemouldDetail: Using skills increases the user's physical defense by (<shuzhi>20% + 200</>) for <shuzhi>15</> seconds (cannot stack, duration can be refreshed).

sickle_physic_ssr_star_6.RemouldDetail: Discharge skills deal an additional <shuzhi>20%</> physical damage to targets for <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

sword_fire_sr_star_2.RemouldDetail: Normal attacks generate explosions, dealing flame damage equal to 90% of ATK in a small radius. Cooldown: 5 seconds.

sword_fire_sr_star_3.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by <shuzhi>10%</>.

sword_fire_sr_star_4.RemouldDetail: Increase damage dealt by 40% when a normal attack hits the target on its side or back.

sword_fire_sr_star_5.RemouldDetail: Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by <shuzhi>20%</>.

sword_fire_sr_star_7.RemouldDetail: Increase damage dealt by 80% when a normal attack hits the target on its side or back.

bow_fire_sr_star_2.RemouldDetail: Grant <yellow_lbl_15_1>Sharp Arrow I</> each time the user hits a target with a Charged Arrow. Sharp Arrow I: Increase final damage by <shuzhi>4%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. The effect can be stacked up to <shuzhi>3</> times.

bow_fire_sr_star_3.RemouldDetail: When equipped with 2 or more DPS-type weapons, deal an additional <shuzhi>5%</> final damage to targets that are further than 6 meters away. Take effect immediately and stack with multiple weapons. Effect is boosted when playing in a team.

bow_fire_sr_star_4.RemouldDetail: Launching a Dodge attack fires <shuzhi>3</> piercing shots.

bow_fire_sr_star_6.RemouldDetail: Grant <yellow_lbl_15_1>Sharp Arrow I</> each time the user hits a target with a Charged Arrow. Sharp Arrow I: Increase final damage by <shuzhi>4%</> for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. The effect can be stacked up to <shuzhi>5</> times.

hammer_thunder_ssr_star_2.RemouldDetail: When equipped with 2 or more defense-type weapons, reduce damage received by <shuzhi>5%</>. Take effect immediately and stack with multiple weapons. Increase aggro by <shuzhi>200%</> when playing in a team. Taunt all enemies in an <shuzhi>8</>-meter radius for <shuzhi>5</> seconds after switching to this weapon. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

hammer_thunder_ssr_star_3.RemouldDetail: After switching to this weapon, the next hit <shuzhi>stuns</> the target for <shuzhi>2</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

hammer_thunder_ssr_star_5.RemouldDetail: Reduce damage received by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds after switching to this weapon. When equipped with 2 or more defense-type weapons, teammates also gain <shuzhi>10%</> damage reduction for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

hammer_thunder_ssr_star_6.RemouldDetail: Targets hit by discharge skills take an additional <shuzhi>20%</> volt damage for the next <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
